name: Shawawofi
description:
Every day, countless water worlds need to be made for all different kinds of purposes.

Sharki is in control of creating the smallest water worlds. It's a simple, calming experience for him.

Or, at least, usually.

Surely the fish won't mind a giant hand corrupting their world, right?

Features 20 worlds of fishy goodness!

'Freeplay' mode gives you unlimited attempts at all worlds. All worlds can be completed with intervening!

Made for Mini Jam 116: Pocket Sized
